hadiths.text: It was narrated from Anas bin Malik that :a Jew crushed the head of a woman between two rocks and killed her, so the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) crushed his head between two rocks

chapter.ara-name: باب يُقْتَادُ مِنَ الْقَاتِلِ كَمَا قَتَلَ
chapter.eng-name: Retaliation Upon The Killer Will Be Carried Out In The Same Manner As He Killed
